parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name for which you want to modify the configurations of real-time log delivery. Only one domain name is supported.

parameters.name: Logstore
parameters.description: The name of the Logstore where log entries are stored.

parameters.name: Project
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service project that is used for real-time log delivery.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Log Service project is deployed. For more information, see [Regions that support real-time log delivery](~~144883~~).
